name: Planetary Purification Arcade (Prototype)
description:
It is just a scrap of mechanics with no graphics or sounds. Do not treat this piece of code as a game.

Original idea:

A fake collection of games from different generations of consoles (NES, SNES, GameBoy, Gamecube, etc.), with all kinds of emulation mechanics like time reversal. The 'Swarm Attack' series of games, where we control a locust queen attacking different planets of humans, each next game in a generation has additional effects, mechanics etc. which can be test-switched in this prototype.
